title.rendered: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes

content.rendered:
Directed by Joe Berlinger. Joe Berlinger.

Cast Greg Bedoe( Self – Investigator, Cook County). Rafael Tovar( Self – Des Plaines P.D.). Mike Albrecht( Self – Des Plaines P.D.). Terry Sullivan( Self – Prosecutor, Cook County). Steve Nemmers( Self – Waterloo, Iowa Resident). Kim Byers-Lund( Self – Rob Piest’s Friend). Lawrence Finder( Self – Prosecutor, Cook County). Ron Robinson( Self – Des Plaines P.D.). Patti Vasquez( Self – Michael Bonnin’s Sister). Dan Genty( Self – Evidence Technician, Cook County Sheriff’s Office). Martha Fourt( Self – Gay Rights Activist). William Kunkle( Self – Prosecutor, Cook County). Ray Cornell( Self – Former Inmate, Anamosa Reformatory). Bill Burger( Self – Fmr. President, Waterloo Jaycees). Kelly Green( Self – Gacy’s Neighbor). Marty Zielinski( Self – Gacy’s Former Employee). Robert Motta Sr.( Self – Gacy’s Defense Attorney). Richard Rappaport( Self – Forensic Psychiatrist). Anthony Antonucci( Self – Former P.D.M. Employee). Ron Beaver( Self – Jury Foreman). Walter Jacobson( Self – Journalist). Jason Moran( Self – Lieutenant, Cook County Sheriff’s Office)

Language English.

Producers Joe Berlinger. Sam Broadwin. Jon Doran. Liz Hodes. Jen Isaacson. Jon Kamen. Mike Mathis. Catharine Park. Ted Schillinger. Austin Short. Wyatt Stone. Noah Weitzman. Christopher Yowan.

Production Mike Mathis Productions.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 3

Status Finished (2022–2022)
